description:
Bitwarden is a password manager. With this package you can keep your passwords safe in your server! 
 You can download the chrome / brave / firefox extension for bitwarden.
 The following tutorial https://github.com/nathPay/ansible-letsencrypt give you the possibility to add a domain name to your bitwarden server and then access it externally.

EXTERNAL.title: Do you plan to create an external access?
EXTERNAL.description: Bitwarden does not work without https so if you if you plan to use it only in LAN please let the value to false and a self signed certificate will be created to bypass this limitation.

bitwardenDataMountPoint.title: Bitwarden data mountpoint
bitwardenDataMountPoint.description: Use this option if you want to store your password in a external drive.
